website_summaries.verdict: The Lenovo Tab 2 A8 is an average 8-inch Android tablet that delivers solid battery life for a good price, but does little else to stand out from the competition.

customer_reviews.title: Great tablet. Had some hick ups with Play Store
customer_reviews.text: Great tablet. Had some hick ups with Play Store. Had to delete some apps by Play Store instructions found on internet. So after suffered, wasted time a bit this became quite good product. Samsung Tab A on other hand is more expensive and all works like a charm from the starters. Good luck choosing the one that suit your needs and budget and finding balance. Price wise and quality wise this tablet is great, so if you have some patience fiddle a bit with it it is every penny worth.
customer_reviews.author: Pens

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: very good tablet, half the price of my last tablet but just as good
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: excellent
customer_reviews.text: well worth the money. No-one will be dissapointed in any way at all.
customer_reviews.author: D. Lockett

customer_reviews.title: A bit disappointed as description said it had the slot for sim ...
customer_reviews.text: A bit disappointed as description said it had the slot for sim card. In reality this model doesn't have it. Apart from that this is a nice tablet, really like it
customer_reviews.author: Lora

customer_reviews.title: very good tablet, never freeze no problems at
customer_reviews.text: very good tablet , never freeze no problems at all
customer_reviews.author: Konti

customer_reviews.title: brilliant.
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my father, he's never put it down, brilliant.
customer_reviews.author: Michele Nicholson

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Perfect keeps my girls entertained great price and very quick delivery came next day would buy again
customer_reviews.author: deborah hughes

customer_reviews.title: I'm very happy!
customer_reviews.text: Item came BNIB factory sealed. Was very easy to set up. Glad to know it can take a sim card. I like the weight of item, it's not 'flimsy' to use. Screen quality very good considering the price (£50). Overall, I'm very happy with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: B'day present for wife, and she loves it. ...
customer_reviews.text: B'day present for wife, and she loves it...... I've tried to get to borrow it but it's a firm 'NO'.. Arrived promptly and very well packaged.
customer_reviews.author: Dave Reigate

customer_reviews.title: It's a decent little tablet however it is not listed ...
customer_reviews.text: It's a decent little tablet however it is not listed correctly. It's listed as the A8-50 when it is the A8-50F. It's not major but I bought a screen protector based off the listing description and it was to big.
customer_reviews.author: Vinnie

product_meta.title: Lenovo TAB 2 A8-50, 8\" Tablet, 16GB, WiFi
product_meta.description: True Colors Show off your tablet by selecting your favorite color from white, blue, red or yellow (3G version only). 8" Wideview IPS Display The A8's HD multitouch display offers a clear and colorful viewing experience whether indoors or outside, plus 30% more screen real estate than a 7" tablet. The in-plane switching (IPS) screen delivers a wide viewing angle, perfect for sharing content with friends. Slim and Light At less than 9mm thin and only weighing 350g the A8's extra display size doesn't cost you anything in terms of portability. The A8 is perfect for reading, listening to music, and web-surfing - and it can easily slide into a pocket or bag when not in use Dolby Digital Plus with Dual Stereo Speakers (3G Version) Dolby audio enhancement allows louder, more natural, distortion-free sound - whether you're listening through headphones or the A8's dual stereo speakers. Quad Core Processing Quad core processing enables better multitasking, delivers a smoother Android experience and eliminates stutter when playing games or HD video. Dual Cameras The A8 takes great photos with the 5 megapixel rear camera, and super selfies with the 2 megapixel front camera, which is also great for web chat with your friends. Satellite GPS and Optional 3G Never get lost with built in satellite GPS that works offline, and get optional 3G wireless support through a micro SIM card slot. Lenovo DOit Apps Lenovo's new DOit series of apps let you and your device do more including sharing data with other Android devices without requiring a network, preventing viruses and malware, and backing up your contacts and sms log. Complete Connectivity Micro USB for charging and connecting peripherals, plus a micro SD card slot for convenience and easy storage expandability.
feature_bullets: 8 inch screen , Resolution 1280 x 800 pixels , IPS technology
1.3GHz mt8161 QC Processor , 1GB RAM ,16 GB internal storage ,Android 5.
3.5mm headphone jack ,Microphone ,microSD memory card slot ,Micro USB ,Gps
